meanings.definition: The legally or formally recognized union of two people as partners in a personal relationship.
meanings.sent1: Their marriage was a beautiful celebration of love and commitment.
meanings.sent2: My parents have been in a happy marriage for over 30 years.
meanings.sent3: The marriage between peanut butter and jelly in a sandwich is always a perfect match.
meanings.sent4: The marriage of flavors in the dish created a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The marriage of colors in the painting was truly captivating.

meanings.definition: A combination or mixture of two or more elements.
meanings.sent1: The marriage of chocolate and strawberries is a delicious treat.
meanings.sent2: The marriage of music and dance creates a mesmerizing performance.
meanings.sent3: The marriage of sweet and salty flavors in the snack was surprisingly tasty.
meanings.sent4: The marriage of tradition and innovation led to a successful product.
meanings.sent5: The marriage of words and images in the book painted a vivid picture.
